医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
社交活动可以防止长期护理居民认知能力下降与他人互动和参加有组织的活动等社交活动可以防止长期护理机构中的认知能力下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Social-activities-offer-protection-against-cognitive-decline-in-long-term-care-residents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Social-activities-offer-protection-against-cognitive-decline-in-long-term-care-residents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3d2cf42-1a43-4dcb-b90d-826bf97000c3 Wed, 20 Mar 2024 09:41:57 -0400 Social activities offer protection against cognitive decline in long-term care residents
研究报告称，与运动和举重相关的颅面损伤发生率不断上升《颅面外科杂志》的一项研究报告称，过去十年中，与运动和举重相关的颅面损伤数量急剧增加。该期刊由威科集团 (Wolters Kluwer) 的 Lippincott 作品集出版。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Study-reports-rising-rates-of-craniofacial-injuries-lated-to-exercise-and-weightlifting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Study-reports-rising-rates-of-craniofacial-injuries-lated-to-exercise-and-weightlifting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25f40a3d-10a1-425f-a469-d82dcff733df Wed, 20 Mar 2024 09:37:38 -0400 Study reports rising rates of craniofacial injuries related to exercise and weightlifting
免疫细胞蛋白被确定为罕见肝癌治疗的潜在靶点纤维板层癌（FLC）是一种罕见的肝癌，如果不及早手术治疗，预后较差。这种疾病是由产生融合蛋白的单一基因突变引起的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Immune-cell- Protein-identified-as-potential-target-for-rare-liver-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Immune-cell- Protein-identified-as-potential-target-for-rare-liver-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32f16fed-dc4d-4968-8cd7-8a805b54deee Wed, 20 Mar 2024 09:33:18 -0400 Immune cell protein identified as potential target for rare liver cancer treatment
冷冻消融可能成为肿瘤较大的乳腺癌患者的新治疗途径根据即将在 2017 年发表的一项新研究，一种使用冰冷冻和摧毁小型癌性肿瘤的微创技术现已被证明对患有大肿瘤的乳腺癌患者有效，为那些不适合手术的患者提供了新的治疗途径。盐湖城介入放射学会年度科学会议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Cryoablation-could-be-a-new-treatment-path-for-breast-cancer-病人-with-large-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Cryoablation-could-be-a-new-treatment-path-for-breast-cancer-患者-with-large-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63bf9cee-8b0d-4306-947e-310f24ca8a89 Wed, 20 Mar 2024 09:06:10 -0400 Cryoablation could be a new treatment path for breast cancer patients with large tumors
电子烟使用者的特定脸颊细胞的 DNA 变化与吸烟者类似伦敦大学学院和因斯布鲁克大学研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，吸烟史有限的电子烟使用者的特定脸颊细胞的 DNA 变化与吸烟者相似。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/E-香烟-users-experience-similar-DNA-changes-to-specific-cheek-cells-as-smokers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/E-香烟-users-experience-similar-DNA-changes-to-specific-cheek-cells-as-smokers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35468d27-48e4-4956-9244-c637206d7c4f Wed, 20 Mar 2024 09:01:24 -0400 E-cigarette users experience similar DNA changes to specific cheek cells as smokers
研究报告美国孕产妇死亡率惊人上升西北医学的一项新研究报告称，美国孕产妇死亡率正在以惊人的速度上升。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Study-reports-alarming-increase-in-US-maternal-mortality-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Study-reports-alarming-increase-in-US-maternal-mortality-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d455c23d-d5ce-40f5-bc67-9a83d447c372 Wed, 20 Mar 2024 07:26:39 -0400 Study reports alarming increase in U.S. maternal mortality rates

对于孩子来说，针痛是一个大问题。一位加州医生有一个计划。几乎所有新父母都经历过这样的经历：听到孩子在医生办公室尖叫的痛苦。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Needle-pain-is-a-big-problem-for-kids-One-California-doctor-has-a-plan.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Needle-pain-is-a-big-problem-for-kids-One-California-doctor-has-a-plan.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=162f488b-b9b6-478b-8f33-0556f636d246 Wed, 20 Mar 2024 06:59:23 -0400 Needle pain is a big problem for kids.
